chunk: Directions: For best results, apply twice a day. When applied at night, the skin absorbs the serum as you sleep, ideal for reducing wrinkles. A moisturizer can be applied after serum to boost the nutrients under the skin reinforcing a soothing feel and radiant shine.
book: 1851-Boyface Double Duty De-Puff & Firm Eye Serum (2020 formulation)
